about_the_game:
Story

Through advanced technology called 'Dataization', it has become possible to contain everything that exists in reality in virtual space. However, the human body could not stay in the virtual space for long, and instead succeeded in capturing the personality.

'Forsteritas', the company that developed the technology, pursues the social good of convenience and benefit for all people and has made the technology available to the general public in a convenient form called a card, among which is a virtual being with a personality similar to that of a human. We are holding a card game competition where you can enjoy using cards containing . This becomes a worldwide festival and is called 'Arcarg', but Forsteritas gradually loses its pursuit of social good and begins kidnapping people for experiments behind the scenes of the competition.

Will Mari and Betty, who participate in the game, discover the other side of Forsteritas? Become Mari and Betty, and meet the characters in the cards!

Controls

  • Left mouse click + drag - Move/place/use card, attack when dragged to opponent

  • Right mouse click + drag - Flip card

Play

  • You can attack if your attack power is higher than the opponent's defense power.

  • You can use cards that influence your opponent to your advantage.

  • When you are at a disadvantage, you can change the positions of the cards in the back row and the cards in the front row by dragging them.

Features

  • Simple operation: Simple operation through clicking and drag-and-drop provides easy play.

  • A game to kill time: A total of 3 rounds of gameplay are available to make boring time fun.

  • Play music that matches the game: Enjoy cyber-like and relaxing music.

  • Character movements and voices! : When using the card, you can enjoy cut scenes of each character's movements and voices.

  • Enjoy together through multiplayer! : You can become more immersed in the game by competing with your friends.

Game & Developer Introduction

"Arcarg" is a game created by eight art workers who do not know much about games. We focused on raising the quality of the story and art visuals. We received help from 4 game programmers, 2 game designers, and 1 story designer.
